metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/96). The prior reference to "subsection (4) of this section" in subsection (1) of this statute has been changed to "subsection (6) of this section" to reflect the renumbering of that prior subsection in 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 127, sec. 3. It also appears from context that the phrase "contained in this subsection" at the beginning of subsection (5) of this statute should read "contained in this section."
